name: musa_new-server
description: New, re-engineered version of the MusA server service, which collapses the existing MusA-Management and MusA-MapCreator solutions in a single one.

scripts.gen-diagram: ts-node node_modules/erdia/dist/cjs/cli.cjs build -d dataSourceConfig.ts -o dist/entity --format html

author: Matteo Seragiotto (matteo.seragiotto@studenti.unimi.it)
